The male weighs 51â101Â g (1.8â3.6Â oz) and the female 67â95Â g (2.4â3.4Â oz).[4][13] The adult of the nominate subspecies has greyish-brown upperparts with dark streaking, a pale buff hindneck collar and a white moustachial line.
